page.title: 08SEDGEFIELD'S EARLY EDUCATION
page.content: WHEN CHILDREN ARE TWO YEARS OLD THEY GO TO PLAYGROUP.IN OUR VILLAGE THERE ARE TWO PLAYGROUPS.ONE IN CEDDESFELD HALL AND ONE IN THE METHODIST CHURCH. WHEN THEY ARE THREE YEARS OLD THEY CAN GO TO NURSERY UNTIL THEY ARE FOUR.THERE IS ONLY ONE NURSERY AT SEDGEFIELD HARDWICK SCHOOL.NURSERY IS WHERE THEY GO TO PREPARE THEM FOR SCHOOL.THE CHILDREN DO NOT HAVE TO GO TO NURSERY. WHEN A CHILD GOES TO SCHOOL HE OR SHE STARTS IN CLASS ONE.WHICH IN OUR SCHOOL SEDGEFIELD HARDWICK IS MRS ASHALL'S CLASS.THE CHILDREN STAY A YEAR IN EACH CLASS.SOME CHILDREN DON'T START SCHOOL UNTIL CHRISTMAS BECAUSE OF THEIR AGE.
